alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; North Sevier; Northwest Cocke (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:27PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jefferson, west central Cocke and central Sevier Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 626 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sevierville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sevierville, Jefferson City, Newport, Dandridge, Pigeon Forge, White Pine, Baneberry, Bird Crossing, Fairgarden and McMahan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
